org.apache.flink.metrics

接口 MetricGroup

  • 所有已知实现类:
    UnregisteredMetricsGroup

    public interface MetricGroup
    A MetricGroup is a named container for Metrics and further metric subgroups.

    Instances of this class can be used to register new metrics with Flink and to create a nested hierarchy based on the group names.

    A MetricGroup is uniquely identified by it's place in the hierarchy and name.

      • getScopeComponents

        String[] getScopeComponents()
        Gets the scope as an array of the scope components, for example ["host-7", "taskmanager-2", "window_word_count", "my-mapper"]
        另请参阅:
        getMetricIdentifier(String), getMetricIdentifier(String, CharacterFilter)

      • getMetricIdentifier

        String getMetricIdentifier(String metricName)
        Returns the fully qualified metric name, for example "host-7.taskmanager-2.window_word_count.my-mapper.metricName"
        参数:
        metricName - metric name
        返回:
        fully qualified metric name

      • getMetricIdentifier

        String getMetricIdentifier(String metricName,
                           CharacterFilter filter)
        Returns the fully qualified metric name, for example "host-7.taskmanager-2.window_word_count.my-mapper.metricName"
        参数:
        metricName - metric name
        filter - character filter which is applied to the scope components if not null.
        返回:
        fully qualified metric name
